item.title: Introduction to Oracle APEX
item.description: Imagine you want to build a big, fancy Lego castle. Each piece you use costs you money, and every time you need to fix or change something, it takes more time and money. Now, instead of building it all by yourself, you have a team of builders. But coordinating all of them to work together smoothly can be really tricky. Sometimes they donâ€™t understand each other well, which can lead to mistakes or delays.
